full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Request for Proposal

**Title:** Grievance Analyst
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01009396
**Publication Date:** 12 October 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** 27 October 2022, 14:00:00

The Department of National Defence invites all pre-qualified suppliers to submit proposals for the provision of senior human resources – grievance analyst services.

**Services Required:**

The objective of this tender is to obtain the services of a senior human resources – grievance analyst, who will provide expert advice and support to the Department on grievance-related matters.

**Eligible Suppliers:**

This tender is open to all pre-qualified suppliers listed below:

* 1019837 Ontario Inc
* 7792395 Canada Inc
* Acosys Consulting Inc
* Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc
* ARTEMP PERSONNEL SERVICES INC
* Calian Ltd
* Contract Community Inc
* Econ Inc.
* Excel Human Resources Inc
* HDP Group Inc
* IPSS Inc
* KORN FERRY (CA) LTD.
* KSAR & ASSOCIATES Inc
* NATTIQ INC
* Newfound Recruiting Corporation
* NewLeaf Performance Inc.
* Protak Consulting Group Inc.
* QMR Staffing Solutions Incorporated
* RHEA INC.
* Samson RH Inc
* TDV Global Inc
* The AIM Group Inc
* The Right Door Consulting & Solutions Incorporated

**Contracting Entity:**

* Department of National Defence
* 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contact:**

* Margaret Tebbutt
* margaret.tebbutt@forces.gc.ca
* 613-541-5010

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Opportunity:**

This tender is open to suppliers based in Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region).

**Language:**

French and English.

Note: The original text has been condensed and rephrased for clarity and concision.
